Inglewood.Exposition Park (Los Angeles): The Exposition Park neighborhood of Los Angeles is the neighborhood park and adjacent district in the south region of Los Angeles, California, United States. The neighborhood is home to;Exposition Park itself, which includes the Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum, Exposition Rose Garden and three museums: the California African American Museum, the California Science Center and the Natural History Museum of Los Angeles County. It is also home to a Science Center Academy.
